product.description: The Expedition Sport adds another level of plushness to the ride with a suspension seatpost. You'll have a wider range of gearing with triple chainrings, leaving you free to explore a wider range of terrain.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Ground Control Geometry for stability and safety, plus 63mm-travel fork with alloy lowers for lightweight confidence on any surface; forged dropouts and integrated kickstand mount
Double-wall, alloy 32-hole rims are strong and smooth
Smooth-rolling Hemisphere 26" tyres with flat protection and semi-connected tread pattern for traction and control on pavement or gravel
Body Geometry Comfort closed-end grips for an ergonomic contact point to keep hands fatigue-free
Comfort saddle uses springs, dual-density foam on top, and has a wide platform for ultimate comfort

specs.frame: FRAME A1 Premium Aluminium, Ground Control Geometry, 26" frame, formed tubes, forged dropouts w/ replaceable derailleur hanger
specs.fork: FORK SR Suntour NEX Coil, aluminium lower, preload adj., 63mm travel
specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" FSA Intelaset, threaded, Cr-Mo cups
specs.stem: STEM Adjustable quill, die-cast alloy, 2-bolt, 150mm x 25.4mm clamp
specs.handlebars: HANDLEBARS Specialized riser bar, alloy, 15-degree backsweep, 60mm rise, 25.4mm
specs.tape: TAPE Specialized Body Geometry Comfort, dual compound
specs.front_brake: FRONT BRAKE Die-cast, alloy V-brake, 60mm 1pc. pad, linear pull
specs.rear_brake: REAR BRAKE Die-cast, alloy V-brake, 60mm 1pc. pad, linear pull
specs.brake_levers: BRAKE LEVERS Alloy, four-finger, Kraton comfort lever
specs.front_derailleur: FRONT DERAILLEUR Shimano FD-TX50, top-swing, dual-pull
specs.crankset: CRANKSET SR Suntour NEX, 8-speed, square spindle, w/ chainguard
specs.bottom_bracket: BOTTOM BRACKET Cartridge bearings, square spindle, capless bolts
specs.pedals: PEDALS Comfort, composite body w/ rubber top, sealed loose ball bearings
specs.front_hub: FRONT HUB Double-sealed, ground race, dual-lock nuts w/ 17mm contact side, 5mm QR
specs.rear_hub: REAR HUB Double-sealed, ground race, freewheel type, QR
specs.front_tire: FRONT TYRE Specialized Hemisphere, 26x1.95", wire bead, Flak Jacket protection, 26 TPI
specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Hemisphere, 26x1.95", wire bead, Flak Jacket protection, 26 TPI
specs.saddle: SADDLE Comfort Plus, dual-density foam, springs

geo.seat_tube_length_b_b_center_to_top: Seat-Tube Length, B-B Center to Top (mm) 370 425 480 535

product.description: The Expedition Sport adds another level of plushness to the ride with a suspension seatpost. You'll have a wider range of gearing with triple chainrings, leaving you free to explore a wider range of terrain, while the low-entry frame improves convenience and confidence.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Ground Control Geometry for stability and safety, the lowest standover in the Specialized line, plus 63mm-travel fork with alloy lowers for lightweight confidence on any surface; forged dropouts and integrated kickstand mount
Double-wall, alloy 32-hole rims are strong and smooth
Smooth-rolling Hemisphere 26" tyres with flat protection and semi-connected tread pattern for traction and control on pavement or gravel
Body Geometry Comfort closed-end grips for an ergonomic contact point to keep hands fatigue-free
Comfort saddle uses springs, dual-density foam on top, and has a wide platform for ultimate comfort

82E0-6602 EXPEDITION SPORT LOW ENTRY WHT/BLK S

product.description: Around town or the campground, the Expedition is comfortable, plush, and perfect for cruising paved and dirt roads. The low-entry frame improves convenience and confidence, while the 21 speeds will keep you pedalling efficiently on any terrain.

bullets.bullet: A1 Premium Aluminium frame with Ground Control Geometry for stability and safety, the lowest standover in the Specialized line, plus 63mm-travel fork with alloy lowers for lightweight confidence on any surface; forged dropouts and integrated kickstand mount
Double-wall, alloy 32-hole rims are strong and smooth
Smooth-rolling Hemisphere 26" tyres with flat protection and semi-connected tread pattern for traction and control on pavement or gravel
Body Geometry Comfort closed-end grips for an ergonomic contact point to keep hands fatigue-free
Comfort saddle uses springs, dual-density foam on top, and has a wide platform for ultimate comfort
